text: You're Not You is the debut novel by U.S. author Michelle Wildgen. It was published by St. Martin’s Press in 2006 and concerns a college student who cares for a classical pianist suffering with Lou Gehrig's disease. ==Film adaptation== In October 2014, a film adaption of You're Not You was released, starring Hilary Swank and Emmy Rossum. ==References== Category:2006 American novels Category:St. Martin's Press books Category:2006 debut novels
title: You're Not You (novel)
